text: The availability of dark mode has brought me so much joy. THANK YOU!

The toggle feature is sweet! Thank you for adding it! I can see the video better when following the instructor and practicing it myself; all on my laptop when I'm not at home (for those of us who study on the go 🚀)
The toggle sidebar is EXACTLY the feature I've been saying ZTM has needed since I joined it.  Makes all the difference in the world!
The extension is working really well!
Just installed this. It works great and contributes to the learning experience.
